titleStmt.title: The discovery of vvitches: in answer to severall queries, lately delivered to the judges of the assize for the county of Norfolk. / And now published by Matthevv Hopkins, witch-finder. For the benefit of the whole kingdome.
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, Matthew, d. 1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Royston, at the Angell in Ivie Lane.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
